name: Swamp Sweep
description:
Defend your lily pad from the nasty flies and grumpy crocodiles! Use the power of your stretchy slimy tongue to yoink as many flies as you can, and power up your croc-bomb to survive as long as you can!

Made for Mini-Jam 79: Frogs

Controls:
WASD = Movement
Mouse = Aim
Left Mouse Button = Extend tongue to catch flies
Right Mouse Button = Use croc-bomb when you've eaten 10 flies and the croc bomb metre is full
Space = Dash

  • Curtis Hagan - Programming & Design
  • Dillan Myers - Art & Sound
  • Jake Hardy - Programming & Design
